${modID}:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
${modID}:ExampleCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This will automatically be used if the card is upgraded. Remove it if unneeded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

${modID}:BlackWidow.NAME: Black Widow
${modID}:BlackWidow.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! *Assassin's *Mark. NL Gain !B! Block and apply !${modID}:magicWeak! Weak for every *Assassin's *Mark stack.
${modID}:BlackWidow.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! *Assassin's *Mark. NL Gain !B! Block and apply !${modID}:magicWeak! Weak for every *Assassin's *Mark stack.

${modID}:AngelFighter.NAME: Angel Fighter
${modID}:AngelFighter.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for every attack card on your hand.
${modID}:AngelFighter.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for every attack card on your hand.

${modID}:AngelPriestess.NAME: Angel Priestess
${modID}:AngelPriestess.DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! life for every skill card on your hand.
${modID}:AngelPriestess.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! life for every skill card on your hand.

${modID}:Beastman.NAME: Beastman
${modID}:Beastman.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for every attack card on your hand.
${modID}:Beastman.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for every attack card on your hand.

${modID}:BlueBug.NAME: Blue Bug
${modID}:BlueBug.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn if you have less than half of your hp, heal 3 life. NL Otherwise gain 3 Block.
${modID}:BlueBug.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn if you have less than half of your hp, heal 3 life. NL Otherwise gain 3 Block.

${modID}:CentaurFighter.NAME: Centaur Fighter
${modID}:CentaurFighter.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deal !M! damage to the rest of enemies.
${modID}:CentaurFighter.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deal !M! damage to the rest of enemies.

${modID}:CommanderArmstrong.NAME: Commander Armstrong
${modID}:CommanderArmstrong.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for every card on your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:CommanderArmstrong.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Deal !D! damage for every card on your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:CthoolAcolyte.NAME: Cthool Acolyte
${modID}:CthoolAcolyte.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a random card and gain !B! Block.
${modID}:CthoolAcolyte.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a random card and gain !B! Block.

${modID}:DarkLord.NAME: Dark Lord
${modID}:DarkLord.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Apply !M! Poison.
${modID}:DarkLord.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Apply !M! Poison.

${modID}:DemonBride.NAME: Demon Bride
${modID}:DemonBride.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose 1 Strength. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:DemonBride.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose 1 Strength. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:DemonGuard.NAME: Demon Guard
${modID}:DemonGuard.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block for every skill card in the hand. NL Lose 3 life.
${modID}:DemonGuard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block for every skill card in the hand. NL Lose 3 life.

${modID}:DesertCat.NAME: Desert Cat
${modID}:DesertCat.DESCRIPTION: Remove ALL Block from the enemy. NL Apply !M! Weak.
${modID}:DesertCat.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Remove ALL Block from the enemy. NL Apply !M! Weak.

${modID}:DesertFighter.NAME: Desert Fighter
${modID}:DesertFighter.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy has Block, deal !${modID}:magicDamage! damage. NL Otherwise deal !D! damage.
${modID}:DesertFighter.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: If the enemy has Block, deal !${modID}:magicDamage! damage. NL Otherwise deal !D! damage.

${modID}:DesertPriestess.NAME: Desert Priestess
${modID}:DesertPriestess.DESCRIPTION: Remove ALL Block from the enemy. NL Deal !D! damage.
${modID}:DesertPriestess.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Remove ALL Block from the enemy. NL Deal !D! damage.

${modID}:DinoWarrior.NAME: Dino Warrior
${modID}:DinoWarrior.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable to yourself.
${modID}:DinoWarrior.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable to yourself.

${modID}:ElderFairy.NAME: Elder Fairy
${modID}:ElderFairy.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy doesn't have the intention to attack, gain !M! [E]. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:ElderFairy.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: If the enemy doesn't have the intention to attack, gain !M! [E].

${modID}:ElfRecruit.NAME: Elf Recruit
${modID}:ElfRecruit.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deal !M! damage to the rest of enemies. NL Apply a random debuff to yourself.
${modID}:ElfRecruit.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Apply a random debuff to yourself.

${modID}:Gorillatron.NAME: Gorillatron
${modID}:Gorillatron.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy intends to attack, gain !B! Block. NL Otherwise deal !D! damage.
${modID}:Gorillatron.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: If the enemy intends to attack, gain !B! Block. NL Otherwise deal !D! damage.

${modID}:GuardianOfTheSigil.NAME: Guardian of the Sigil
${modID}:GuardianOfTheSigil.DESCRIPTION: Refill your energy only if you have no cards on the draw or discard pile. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:GuardianOfTheSigil.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Refill your energy only if you have no cards on the draw or discard pile.

${modID}:HammerOfFate.NAME: Hammer of Fate
${modID}:HammerOfFate.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy dies, gain !M! Strength and !${modID}:magicDex! Dexterity.
${modID}:HammerOfFate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy dies, gain !M! Strength and !${modID}:magicDex! Dexterity.

${modID}:IronArm.NAME: Iron Arm
${modID}:IronArm.DESCRIPTION: If this is the only Attack card in your hand, deal !M! damage. Otherwise deal !D! damage.
${modID}:IronArm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: If this is the only Attack card in your hand, deal !M! damage. Otherwise deal !D! damage.

${modID}:LadyOfTheDarkSouls.NAME: Lady of the Dark Souls
${modID}:LadyOfTheDarkSouls.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies for every card played this turn.
${modID}:LadyOfTheDarkSouls.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies for every card played this turn.

${modID}:Lullyp.NAME: Lullyp
${modID}:Lullyp.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and gain !B! Block for every card on your hand.
${modID}:Lullyp.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and gain !B! Block for every card on your hand.

${modID}:MageThief.NAME: Mage Thief
${modID}:MageThief.DESCRIPTION: Steal !M! Gold X times. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:MageThief.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Steal !M! Gold X times. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Nephil.NAME: Nephil
${modID}:Nephil.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL If you have less than half hp, heal !M! life. Otherwise lose !${modID}:hpLoss! life.
${modID}:Nephil.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL If you have less than half hp, heal !M! life.

${modID}:PoisonDino.NAME: Poison Dino
${modID}:PoisonDino.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Poison. NL Deal damage equal to the amount of Poison the enemy has. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:PoisonDino.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Poison. NL Deal damage equal to the amount of Poison the enemy has. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:PoisonImp.NAME: Poison Imp
${modID}:PoisonImp.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage X times. NL Apply !M! Poison X times.
${modID}:PoisonImp.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage X times. NL Apply !M! Poison X times.

${modID}:PredatorForm.NAME: Predator Form
${modID}:PredatorForm.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Thorns. NL Every time you deal damage apply 3 Poison.
${modID}:PredatorForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Thorns. NL Every time you deal damage apply 3 Poison.

${modID}:PriestHealer.NAME: Priest Healer
${modID}:PriestHealer.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy dies, heal !M! life.
${modID}:PriestHealer.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy dies, heal !M! life.

${modID}:RoboHound.NAME: Robo Hound
${modID}:RoboHound.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:RoboHound.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Robowitch.NAME: Robowitch
${modID}:Robowitch.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, gain !M! Block.
${modID}:Robowitch.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, gain !M! Block.

${modID}:SeekerOfTheLight.NAME: Seeker of the Light
${modID}:SeekerOfTheLight.DESCRIPTION: Remove all your debuffs. NL Heal !M! Life for every stack of debuffs removed. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:SeekerOfTheLight.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Remove all your debuffs. NL Heal !M! Life for every stack of debuffs removed. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Sentinel.NAME: Sentinel
${modID}:Sentinel.DESCRIPTION: Add a *Robo *Hound to your discard pile for every card on your exhaust pile. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:Sentinel.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a *Robo *Hound to your discard pile for every card on your exhaust pile. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:SigilEssence.NAME: Sigil Essence
${modID}:SigilEssence.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain !M! Intangible. NL Gain !${modID}:magicDex! Dexterity.
${modID}:SigilEssence.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain !M! Intangible. NL Gain !${modID}:magicDex! Dexterity.

${modID}:SpaceCommander.NAME: Space Commander
${modID}:SpaceCommander.DESCRIPTION: If you have less than 50% of your health, gain !M! Buffer. Otherwise gain !${modID}:magicMet! Metallicize.
${modID}:SpaceCommander.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL If you have less than 50% of your health, gain !M! Buffer. Otherwise gain !${modID}:magicMet! Metallicize.

${modID}:SpheresOfDuplication.NAME: Spheres of Duplication
${modID}:SpheresOfDuplication.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card from your discard pile, add X copies of that card to your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:SpheresOfDuplication.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose a card from your discard pile, add X+!M! copies of that card to your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Succubus.NAME: Succubus
${modID}:Succubus.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Poison to all enemies. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:Succubus.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Poison to all enemies. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:ThornMonk.NAME: Thorn Monk
${modID}:ThornMonk.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Thorns. NL Deal damage equal to your Thorns stack amount.
${modID}:ThornMonk.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Thorns. NL Deal damage equal to your Thorns stack amount.

${modID}:TurquoiseGuard.NAME: Turquoise Guard
${modID}:TurquoiseGuard.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If the enemy has Poison, deal !D! damage.
${modID}:TurquoiseGuard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If the enemy has Poison, deal !D! damage.

${modID}:V01B01.NAME: V01-B01
${modID}:V01B01.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL When drawn gain !M! [E]. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:V01B01.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL When drawn gain !M! [E]. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:VampireLord.NAME: Vampire Lord
${modID}:VampireLord.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Heal for the unblocked damage dealt.
${modID}:VampireLord.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Heal for the unblocked damage dealt.

${modID}:YoungMermaid.NAME: Young Mermaid
${modID}:YoungMermaid.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy has Weak, deal !D! damage. Otherwise gain !B! Block.
${modID}:YoungMermaid.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: If the enemy has Weak, deal !D! damage. Otherwise gain !B! Block.

${modID}:AssassinMaster.NAME: Assassin Master
${modID}:AssassinMaster.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! for every *Assassin's *Mark stack. NL Add !M! damage for every Weak stack.
${modID}:AssassinMaster.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! for every *Assassin's *Mark stack. NL Add !M! damage for every Weak stack.
